title: Mobile Language Learning Course Based on Digital Technology-Utilized Learning Pattern Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and intermediate language proficiency
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive language improvement course for corporate employees, combining learning analytics and qualitative research methods to analyze digital skill utilization patterns and provide personalized learning strategies

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish three or more language learning strategies by utilizing diverse digital resources provided on mobile learning platforms.
Learners can analyze their digital technology usage patterns and improve learning outcomes by over 15% based on this analysis.
Learners can design personalized learning pathways using feedback based on learning analytics data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
